title: Bird nest (egg)

properties.name: description
properties.value: A bird nest with an egg can be found while woodcutting most types of trees, as well as several other activities. Bird nests contain one of a red, blue, or green bird's egg, and also provide an empty nest. The chance of getting a bird nest from a tree is 1/256 each time you would normally get a log, regardless of the type of tree. If a nest appears while a player is cutting a tree, a chirping sound will usually be heard, and the player will get a message in the chat box stating, "A bird's nest falls out of the tree." The nest is dropped on the ground and will despawn after 30 seconds if not picked up. Redwood trees do not drop egg nests, and instead only drop clue nests.

SMW Subobject for Green eggHigh Alchemy value: 271Examine: It's a bird's nest with an egg in it.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Bird nest (egg)Uses infobox: ItemImage: File:Bird nest (green egg).pngWeight: 0.002Value: 453Version anchor: Green eggRelease date: 6 June 2005Item ID: 5071

A bird nest with an egg can be found while woodcutting most types of trees, as well as several other activities. Bird nests contain one of a red, blue, or green bird's egg, and also provide an empty nest. The chance of getting a bird nest from a tree is 1/256 each time you would normally get a log, regardless of the type of tree. If a nest appears while a player is cutting a tree, a chirping sound will usually be heard, and the player will get a message in the chat box stating, "A bird's nest falls out of the tree." The nest is dropped on the ground and will despawn after 30 seconds if not picked up. Redwood trees do not drop egg nests, and instead only drop clue nests.

Bird's eggs can be offered to the shrine in the Woodcutting Guild to receive 100 Prayer experience and a seed nest.

When woodcutting, a roll is done to determine the type of nest the player will receive. The table contains 100 slots: 3/100 egg nest (one for each colour), 32/100 ring nest, 65/100 seed nest. When wearing a strung rabbit foot, five seed slots are removed, making the chances 3/95 for bird's egg, 32/95 for ring and 60/95 for seeds.[1]

During bird house trapping, up to 10 nest rolls are performed with a chance of getting a ring nest. For successful rolls, the chance is 3/100 for an egg nest. Wearing a strung rabbit foot removes 5 empty nest slots, making the chance for an egg nest 3/95.

Egg nests are also rewarded from Managing Miscellania when subjects are tasked with collecting maple, teak or mahogany logs.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
14 April 2016
(update)

The message received when causing a bird's nest to fall whilst woodcutting is now displayed in red.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • There is a 1/256 chance that the Armadyl crossbow special attack sound will be heard instead of the chirping sound when a nest is dropped from a tree.[2]

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 26 October 2018. (Archived from the original on 26 May 2020.) Mod Ash: "If you've got the rabbit foot necklace, pick number 0-94 inclusive. Otherwise, pick number 0-99 inclusive. 0 = red egg, 1 = blue egg, 2 = green egg, 3-34 = ring, otherwise it's seeds."
  2. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 18 June 2017. (Archived from the original on 26 May 2020.) Mod Ash: "Yup."
